name: Tapico
description:
Tapico brings the benefits of open banking to the entire wealth management spectrum by building tools that connect a disparate financial landscape. Our universal API provides access to a range of financial data, enabling companies to enhance their offering to the market by building on top of payment account data, balances, transactions, and payment initiation functionality.

The flexibility of our platform allows the capture and management of end-user consents to be applied to any third party application a financial institution has contracted with directly. Helping propositions extend beyond open banking whilst maintaining a consistency of security and user experience.

jobs.title: Lead Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We have an exciting new Lead Enginner position to work in a greenfield, well funded Fintech startup.
 
Working with our founders, you will be part of the management group. As an early stage joiner, you will have a voice and influence to impact the direction and future of Tapico.
 
The new Lead Engineer has the potential to be the future CTO of our cloud native organisation within 12 months. 

Tapico is embarking on an exciting journey with lofty goals and we are looking for great people to join us.

We're laying strong foundations for an interconnected financial future. We're building the rails that power innovation in financial services and Fintech, to enable the creation of solutions the industry has only just begun to imagine.

If you are an analytical problem solver with strong technical skills (Typescript, NodeJS, React knowledge preferred), and have a passion to lead in Fintech and innovation, we have the perfect job for you!

We’re looking for people who have high potential and a willingness to strive to realise that potential.

An interest in Financial Services and Fintech is a must.

As a Lead Engineer, you will:

* Work on and lead the development of applications and services using Agile development methods
* Build an engineering capability that scales with Tapico's success
* Contribute to team and organisational improvements in process and infrastructure, including the development of scalable cloud infrastructure capabilities  
* Ensure solutions are reliable and scalable
* Help build and be responsible for the technology behind the customer-facing product and associated automated controls, aiming for little to no manual / human intervention where possible
* Build tools that connect a universal API providing access to a range of financial data 
* Develop CI/CD pipelines and embedding associated best practices


If you think this is you, please get in touch: recruitment@tapico.io
